Bash(git -C /Users/rajnishkhatri/Documents/recipe-chatbot commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(lesson-17): add Agent Explainability Framework

Complete implementation of four-pillar explainability system:

Backend Components:
- BlackBoxRecorder: Aviation-style flight recorder for agent workflows
- AgentFacts: Verifiable metadata with cryptographic signatures (arXiv:2506.13794)
- GuardRails: Declarative validators with rich trace generation
- PhaseLogger: Multi-phase workflow logging (AgentRxiv-inspired)
- PolicyBridge: Connects AgentFacts policies to GuardRails enforcement

Tests (114 passing):
- Comprehensive TDD coverage for all components
- Edge case handling and type validation tests

Interactive Notebooks:
- 01: BlackBox recording demo
- 02: AgentFacts verification workflows
- 03: GuardRails validation traces
- 04: PhaseLogger workflow visualization

Tutorials & Documentation:
- Explainability fundamentals narrative
- BlackBox explanation guide
- Analysis and reflection documents

Data Generation:
- Synthetic datasets for PII examples, workflow traces
- Agent metadata and parameter log generators

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
